item.name: UPS Device uptime
item.description: The time since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item.name: UPS Source Type
item.description: other(1), none(2), normal(3), bypass(4), battery(5), booster(6), reducer(7)

trigger.name: Ping loss is too high on {HOST.NAME}
Response time is too high on {HOST.NAME}
{HOST.NAME}: UPS Battery Charge Level was changed
{HOST.NAME}: UPS Power Source Type was changed
